###iQueue.py### Settings completed. You must restart the xbmcflicks plugin.
After you have linked xbmcflick in netflix. Click OK after you finished the link in your browser window.
Settings completed. You must restart XBMC.

Get Plot from Netflix Strip out Actor Names from Summary Yes No Include Year in Title Name Get Cast Info from Netflix Use Alt Player Location Expand TV Episodes Automatically OSX Are you in Canada? Debug Options Enable Debug Logging Enable Verbose User Information Warning: Verbose User Information will output your user ID and Token in the log file Note: The options below will increase load time
